Headline: Howard- bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard- bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delay following an earlier door problem at 69th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard- bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delay following an earlier door problem at 69th. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at  Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Kimball/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, Bryn Mawr, Pulaski, Peterson and Kimball: due to, street blockage near Bryn Mawr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, Bryn Mawr, Pulaski, Peterson and Kimball: due to, street blockage near Bryn Mawr.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Southbound Reroute near Central/Belmont
ShortDescription: Southbound 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Belmont, Austin, Diversey and Central: due to, street blockage near Central/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Belmont, Austin, Diversey and Central: due to, street blockage near Central/Belmont.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
